item.title: 南非玉米产量因降雨升至历史第二高水平
item.description: 由于今年早些时候雨水充沛，南非农民在 2025 年可能收获了有史以来第二大玉米作物。【原文：South African farmers probably produced the second-biggest corn crop on record in 2025 as the country experienced good rains earlier in the year.】

item.title: 古普塔说他不知道特拉菲古拉的数百万镍矿在哪里
item.description: 普拉蒂克-古普塔（Prateek Gupta）是特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）称其在一起大规模镍矿诈骗案中诈骗了 6 亿美元的人。【原文：Prateek Gupta, the man Trafigura Group says defrauded it of $600 million in a massive nickel scam, told a court on Thursday he didn’t know where much of that money has gone.】

item.title: 铜矿紧缺令中国冶炼厂在年费谈判中倍感压力
item.description: 在全球矿商与世界第一大精炼铜生产商之间的定价谈判中，赌注异常之大。【原文：The stakes are unusually high in pricing negotiations between global miners and the world’s top producer of refined copper.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国家石油公司继承人恢复天然气设施，产量翻番
item.description: 尼日利亚国家石油公司（Nigerian National Petroleum Co.）和 Heirs Energies 公司恢复了停产一年多的天然气设施的生产，使该合资企业的产量翻了一番，并增加了对苦于燃料短缺的电力生产商的供应。【原文：Nigerian National Petroleum Co. and Heirs Energies have restored production at a gas facility that had been offline for more than a year, enabling the joint venture to double output and increase supplies to power producers struggling with fuel shortages.】

item.title: 信实创投将在印度建设价值 110 亿美元的人工智能数据中心
item.description: 穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的信实工业有限公司、布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）和数字房地产信托公司（Digital Realty Trust Inc.【原文：Digital Connexion, a joint venture between Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance Industries Ltd., Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Digital Realty Trust Inc. has signed a pact to invest $11 billion by 2030 for developing a data center in southern India, marking the latest investment in one of technology’s fastest-growing arenas.】

item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，肖娜-戈什（Shona Ghosh）将与一位风险投资家探讨人工智能对初创企业研究和投资的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 智利总统热门人选何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特准备在获胜后度短暂蜜月
item.description: 智利保守派总统候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）的一位顾问说，如果他在下个月的决选中获胜，那么他兑现竞选承诺的时间窗口将异常狭窄，因为国会分裂和挥之不去的社会不满情绪迫在眉睫。【原文：Chile’s conservative presidential front-runner José Antonio Kast will have an exceptionally narrow window of time to deliver on campaign pledges if he wins next month’s runoff, one of his advisers said, as a divided Congress and lingering social discontent loom.】

item.title: 安哥拉投资 40 亿美元建厂处理独立气田
item.description: 安哥拉总统若昂-卢伦索在索约为一家耗资40亿美元的天然气加工厂揭幕。【原文：Angolan President João Lourenço opened a $4 billion gas processing plant in Soyo as the longtime crude producer increases its focus on the fuel.】

item.title: 南非工业气体用户成立公司以集中需求
item.description: 南非的一些工业气体用户成立了一家公司，以应对当前燃料供应量的预期下降。【原文：A group of South Africa’s industrial gas users has created a company to prepare for an expected drop in their current fuel supply.】

item.title: 英国市场下跌为后预算救济提供了现实依据
item.description: 周四，英国的债券和货币从财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）发布预算案后的涨势中回落。【原文：The UK’s bonds and currency pulled back on Thursday from a rally following Chancellor Rachel Reeves’s budget.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦建筑业大亨转向采矿业，标志着权力转移
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦的两位建筑业大亨正寻求将其商业帝国扩展到采矿业，这凸显了新资金正在如何挤掉与该国前任总统有关的利益集团。【原文：Two Kazakh construction tycoons are looking to extend their business empires into mining, underlining how new money is edging out interests connected to the country’s previous president.】

item.title: 英特尔纠纷加深，前台积电高管住所遭搜查
item.description: 检察官搜查了被指控可能向英特尔公司泄露商业机密的台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Prosecutors have searched the homes of a former Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. executive accused of potentially leaking trade secrets to Intel Corp., suggesting the government is deepening a probe into the high-profile dispute.】

item.title: Revolut 董事长称英国印花税减免对科技公司 IPO 有吸引力
item.description: 挑战者银行 Revolut Ltd. 主席表示，英国预算中旨在吸引更多公司加入伦敦证券交易所的措施将有助于该交易所与纳斯达克竞争金融科技上市。【原文：Measures in the UK budget to attract more companies to the London Stock Exchange will help the bourse compete against the Nasdaq for financial technology listings, the chair of challenger bank Revolut Ltd. said.】

item.title: 纳斯达克寻求提高顶级比特币 ETF 期权的交易上限
item.description: 随着投资者需求的增加，纳斯达克国际证券交易所（Nasdaq's International Securities Exchange）建议将与贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Nasdaq’s International Securities Exchange proposed quadrupling the daily trading limit for options tied to BlackRock Inc.’s iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF as demand from investors increases.】

item.title: 中国警告蓬勃发展的仿人机器人产业存在泡沫风险
item.description: 中国最高经济规划机构对仿人机器人行业形成泡沫的风险发出警告，官方罕见地表达了对这一蓬勃发展行业的担忧。【原文：China’s top economic-planning agency has warned over the risk of a bubble forming in humanoid robotics, in a rare official expression of concern about the booming sector.】

item.title: 打击民调机构为哥伦比亚总统竞选蒙上阴影
item.description: 哥伦比亚正在努力提高民调的准确性，但这一努力开始适得其反，在明年总统大选之前给选民和投资者的政治前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：A push to make polling more accurate in Colombia is starting to backfire, clouding the political landscape for voters and investors ahead of next year’s presidential election.】

item.title: 波兰计划在 2026 年初大量销售外币债券
item.description: 波兰财政部公共债务主管表示，波兰计划在 2026 年开始大量出售外币债券，预计投资者的兴趣足以满足主权国家不断增长的借贷需求。【原文：Poland plans to start 2026 with a flurry of foreign-currency bond sales, expecting sufficient investor interest to fund the sovereign’s growing borrowing needs, according to the Finance Ministry’s public debt chief.】

item.title: 日本一级交易商寻求出售更多短期债券
item.description: 据日本财务省周四的一份简报称，日本的一级交易商要求增加 2 年期、5 年期和 10 年期国债的销售，并减少超长期债券的发行。【原文：Japan’s primary dealers have requested more sales of two-, five- and 10-year government notes, as well as a decrease in issuance of super-long bonds, according to a Ministry of Finance briefing on Thursday.】

item.title: Boohoo 就新管理层激励计划回避 Frasers
item.description: 英国快速时尚零售商 Boohoo Group Plc 将绕过大股东 Frasers Group Plc，推出一项新的管理层激励计划，以推进其扭亏为盈的努力。【原文：British fast-fashion retailer Boohoo Group Plc will bypass major shareholder Frasers Group Plc on a new management incentive plan, as it pushes ahead with its turnaround efforts.】

item.title: 英国提高税收，CEO 批评 "先买后付 "预算案
item.description: 英国财政大臣试图通过260亿英镑（约合340亿美元）的增税来支撑国家财政，一些英国最大公司的首席执行官对瑞秋-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的预算案提出了质疑。【原文：Chief executive officers of some of Britain’s biggest companies took aim at Rachel Reeves’ budget as the chancellor of the Exchequer sought to shore up the country’s finances with £26 billion ($34 billion) of tax rises.】

item.title: 欧盟反洗钱机构将任命意大利人洛佩兹为犯罪事务主管
item.description: 欧洲警察情报机构即将任命一名意大利高级执法官员担任其金融犯罪部门的新负责人，因为该集团正在加紧努力追踪跨境非法资金。【原文：Europe’s police-intelligence agency is close to appointing a senior Italian law-enforcement official as the new head of its financial crime department, as the bloc steps up efforts to track illicit funds across borders.】

item.title: 奇货可居：格雷厄姆-埃里森谈美中战争的风险（播客）
item.description: 美国和中国正陷入 "修昔底德陷阱"，即当一个老牌强国受到一个迅速崛起的强国的威胁时，战争的风险就会增加。哈佛大学道格拉斯-狄龙（Douglas Dillon）政府学教授格雷厄姆-艾利森（Graham Allison）将这一框架广为流传。艾利森教授数十年来一直在撰写关于中国和中美关系的文章。他一直关注两个大国之间发生暴力冲突的几率越来越大。在本期节目中，他将解释自己的工作和对中国的看法。【原文：The US and China are in a “Thucydides Trap,” whereby the risk of war is heightened when an established power is threatened by a rapidly rising power. This is the framework that’s been popularized by Graham Allison, the Douglas Dillon Professor of Government at Harvard University. Professor Allison has been writing about China and the US-China relationship for decades. He’s been focused on the growing odds of a violent conflict between the two powers. On this episode, he explains his work and the】

item.title: 委内瑞拉禁止在美国警告后停止运营的航空公司
item.description: 在美国联邦航空管理局发出安全警告后，委内瑞拉吊销了暂停飞往南美国家航班的几家航空公司的运营执照。【原文：Venezuela has revoked the operating licenses for several carriers that paused flights to the South American nation following a security warning from the US Federal Aviation Administration.】

item.title: 摩根大通基于多重积极因素上调中国股市评级
item.description: 摩根大通银行将其对中国股市的建议上调至 "增持"，称明年大幅上涨的前景超过了大幅亏损的风险。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has raised its recommendation for China’s stocks to “overweight,” stating that the prospect of large gains next year now outweighs the risk of significant losses.】

item.title: 银行为孤星公司收购 Hillenbrand 公司准备了 31 亿美元债务
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在牵头进行一笔约 31 亿美元的债务融资，支持 Lone Star 基金对设备公司 Hillenbrand Inc.【原文：Bank of America Corp. and UBS Group AG are leading a roughly $3.1 billion debt financing backing Lone Star Funds’ take-private of equipment company Hillenbrand Inc., as the flow of cross-border debt deals starts to pick up.】

item.title: 紧张局势升级，日本媒体被禁止参加中国航展
item.description: 由于中日地缘政治关系持续紧张，日本记者被禁止进入中国的一个贸易展会。【原文：Japanese journalists have been barred from entering a Chinese trade show as geopolitical tensions between the two nations persist.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀进一步缓解，为降息提供支持
item.description: 由于食品价格增长放缓，赞比亚的年度通货膨胀率降至两年多来的最低水平。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation slowed to its lowest level in more than two years as food-price growth slowed.】

item.title: 里氏警告 "酷 "青年时尚赌注助长了韩元的疲软势头
item.description: 韩国央行行长表示，他对韩元兑美元汇率逼近 1,500 美元并不太担心，他担心的是推动韩元兑美元汇率逼近 1,500 美元的力量：韩国年轻人大量投资海外股票。【原文：South Korea’s central bank chief said he is less concerned about the won approaching 1,500 per dollar than he is about the force driving it there: young Koreans piling heavily into overseas stocks.】
